text:
Another possible option to block windows 11, if you aren't using the TPM chip,
disable it in bios. 
Then you machine isn't 11 compatible so 11 wont be offered. Re-enable it when
ready to jump to 11.

metadata.email_text_original:
Windows 11 upgrade 
Another possible option to block windows 11, if you aren't using the TPM chip,
disable it in bios. 
Then you machine isn't 11 compatible so 11 wont be offered.  Re-enable it when
ready to jump to 11. 
On 10/25/2023 10:05 PM, 'Ira Shapiro' via PatchManagement wrote:
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/78aaded6-dd80-48e5-9777-1ff90382921c%40email.vccs.edu
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Windows 11 upgrade
